entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Lawrence

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 12:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High zero except plus 3 along the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High zero except plus 3 along the coast. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
